body_html: Does it work fine if you use a 10th of the learning rate. It looks like you are hitting infinities in your optimization. That can happen if the optimization is at the edge of stability. Using reduced precision makes numerics less stable.
body_text: Does it work fine if you use a 10th of the learning rate. It looks like you are hitting infinities in your optimization. That can happen if the optimization is at the edge of stability. Using reduced precision makes numerics less stable.
body: Does it work fine if you use a 10th of the learning rate. It looks like you are hitting infinities in your optimization. That can happen if the optimization is at the edge of stability. Using reduced precision makes numerics less stable.
